pageContext.description:
​

About Matt

​ Matt Holt (BS & MS Computer Science, Brigham Young University) is a software engineer with special expertise in TLS deployment and automation. He is the designer and principal author of the Caddy web server -- the first and only server to use HTTPS by default. Caddy is now considered the de-facto standard for server-side TLS at scale. ​ When Matt's not coding with his bare hands, you can find him rock climbing.
pageContext.name: Matt Holt
